get.description: Retrieves a list of store categories based on storeId . The response includes category details, and labels based on the authorization status

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for a store will be shared as part of the integration kit.It is a path variable

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The country code of the identified customer location

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The state code of the identified customer location

storeId.description: A unique identifier for a store

categoryList.description: A list containing details of SureBright categories

get.description: This endpoint retrieves a list of warranty quotes for a specific product and its price.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for a store will be shared as part of the integration kit. this will be added as path variable

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The country code of the identified customer location

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The state code of the identified customer location

parameters.name: productUrl
parameters.description: The URL containing the product page that is shown to the customer

parameters.name: price
parameters.description: The price of the product in the currency of the country specified in the above parameter

warrantyQuoteId.description: A unique ID representing this specific return quote in this particular API call

warrantyQuoteItemList.description: A list of warranty offers generated for this particular request

warrantyTenure.description: Duration of the warranty in years

warrantyQuoteItemId.description: Unique identifier for the warranty quote item

tncLink.description: Unique link for legal Terms & Conditions of the warranty for each product Category

productImageUrl.description: Link of the product image that can be show as part of the warranty offer UI

coverageWidgetHeading.description: Heading for the various tenure options shown to a customer on the product page

coveragePopupHeading.description: Title that nudges the customers to buy a warranty for their product purchase
coveragePopupHeading.example: Don’t want to spend extra on this product for the next few years? We've got you covered!

coverageList.description: List of coverage options grouped under different sections

example: Protection against everyday spills (food, beverages, human or pet biological stains, cosmetics, etc).

get.description: This endpoint fetches all warranty quotes for the product category to which product in the sent URL belongs.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for a store will be shared as part of the integration kit.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The country code of the identified customer location

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The state code of the identified customer location

parameters.name: productUrl
parameters.description: Base64 encoded URL containing the product page that is shown to the customer

warrantyQuoteId.description: A unique ID representing this specific return quote in this particular API call

warrantyQuoteItemList.description: A list of warranty offers generated for this particular request

warrantyTenure.description: Duration of the warranty in years

warrantyQuoteItemId.description: Unique identifier for the warranty quote item

tncLink.description: Unique link for legal Terms & Conditions of the warranty for each product Category

productImageURL.description: Link of the product image that can be show as part of the warranty offer UI

coverageWidgetHeading.description: Heading for the various tenure options shown to a customer on the product page

coveragePopupHeading.description: Title that nudges the customers to buy a warranty for their product purchase
coveragePopupHeading.example: Don’t want to spend extra on this product for the next few years? We've got you covered!

coverageList.description: List of coverage options grouped under different sections

example: Protection against everyday spills (food, beverages, human or pet biological stains, cosmetics, etc).

get.description: This endpoint retrieves a list of warranty quotes for a specific store and category. The response includes detailed warranty options, pricing, and coverage information.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for a store will be shared as part of the integration kit. this will be added as path variable

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The country code of the identified customer location

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The state code of the identified customer location

parameters.name: sbCategoryId
parameters.description: The URL containing the product page that is shown to the customer

parameters.name: price
parameters.description: The price of the product in the currency of the country specified in the above parameter

warrantyQuoteId.description: A unique ID representing this specific return quote in this particular API call

warrantyQuoteItemList.description: A list of warranty offers generated for this particular request

warrantyTenure.description: Duration of the warranty in years

warrantyQuoteItemId.description: Unique identifier for the warranty quote item

tncLink.description: Unique link for legal Terms & Conditions of the warranty for each product Category

coverageWidgetHeading.description: Heading for the various tenure options shown to a customer on the product page

coveragePopupHeading.description: Title that nudges the customers to buy a warranty for their product purchase
coveragePopupHeading.example: Don’t want to spend extra on this product for the next few years? We've got you covered!

coverageList.description: List of coverage options grouped under different sections

example: Protection against everyday spills (food, beverages, human or pet biological stains, cosmetics, etc).

post.description: This endpoint creates warranty contracts for a specific order.

storeId.description: A unique identifier for a store will be shared as part of the integration kit

partnerOrderId.description: Unique identifier for the complete successful order placed by a customer on the merchant site. This represents the whole order that can have multiple line items of different quantities.

orderPurchaseDateTime.description: Date time at which the order was purchased by customer.

lineItemList.description: The lineItemList consists of individual line items representing purchased policies. Each line item is uniquely identified by a lineItemId (String: maximum length 48 characters). The warrantyQuoteId and warrantyQuoteItemId serve to identify the specific quote option acquired by the customer. A line item must include warrantyQuoteItemId and warrantyQuoteId. The unitSalePrice and totalPrice indicate the price at which the policy was purchased by the customer. Please refrain from sending a line item in which no policy sales have been made. OptionId is the combination of product attributes separated by #.

productTitle.example: GreatCircleUSA 3-in-1 Wood Chipper - 7HP Engine, 3 Max Branch Capacity

country.description: Country code for USA is US

storeId.description: A unique identifier for a store will be shared as part of the integration kit

partnerOrderId.description: A unique identifier for the complete successful order placed by a customer on the merchant site. This represents the whole order that can have multiple line items of different quantities.

contractList.description: The list of contracts generated for each quantity in each line item. If any error in generating a contract, the error code and msg will be added for that item instead of the contract id.

errorMessage.example: Failed to create contract due to invalid quote ID

put.description: To cancel a specific line item, Using PUT method of order API, set the field 'warrantyQuantity' in lineItem inside lineItemList to 0 as part of the lineItem details as shown below. If a contract has been cancelled, it cannot be marked as active again.

storeId.description: A unique identifier for a store will be shared as part of the integration kit

partnerOrderId.description: Unique identifier for the complete successful order placed by a customer on the merchant site. This represents the whole order that can have multiple line items of different quantities.

orderPurchaseDate.description: Date time at which the order was purchased by customer.

lineItemList.description: The lineItemList consists of individual line items representing purchased policies. Each line item is uniquely identified by a lineItemId (String: maximum length 48 characters). The warrantyQuoteId and warrantyQuoteItemId serve to identify the specific quote option acquired by the customer. A line item must include warrantyQuoteItemId and warrantyQuoteId. The unitWarrantySalePrice and totalWarrantyPrice indicate the price at which the policy was purchased by the customer. Please refrain from sending a line item in which no policy sales have been made. OptionId is the combination of product attributes separated by #.

productTitle.example: GreatCircleUSA 3-in-1 Wood Chipper - 7HP Engine, 3 Max Branch Capacity

country.description: Country code for USA is US

storeId.description: A unique identifier for a store will be shared as part of the integration kit

partnerOrderId.description: A unique identifier for the complete successful order placed by a customer on the merchant site. This represents the whole order that can have multiple line items of different quantities.

contractList.description: The list of contracts generated for each quantity in each line item. If any error in generating a contract, the error code and msg will be added for that item instead of the contract id.
